scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development watchify -d static/tunnel_rush/js/main.js -o static/tunnel_rush/js/tunnel_rush.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify static/tunnel_rush/js/main.js -o static/tunnel_rush/js/tunnel_rush.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -g uglifyify
